name: Pongfy
description:
Try pong in a different way

In this small game, you have 5 lives and you must score as many points as you can. The game also has a highscore table.

Commands:

W = UP

 S  = Down

Game made in clickteam fusion 2.5

If you liked the game consider making a donation, any amount is welcome, follow me and I will post more games soon
